noun.definition: A flat, raised area or platform, often outside a building
noun.example: We had breakfast on the terrace overlooking the garden.

noun.definition: A row of houses joined together in a line
noun.example: They live in a terrace near the city center.

noun.definition: A level step built on the side of a hill for farming
noun.example: Rice terraces are common in mountainous regions.

verb.definition: To build terraces on sloped land for cultivation
verb.example: The farmers terraced the hillside to grow crops.

usage_examples: They enjoyed the sunset from the terrace of their home.
